attributes.action: Publically Fund Lifeboats as part of the Coastguard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why in an island nation is it necessary for the RNLI to be a voluntary charity and not a government funded body.
Join the countries lifeboats and lifeguards with the Coastguard to form a cohesive body to protect all users of one of this countries greatest assets.
